name: CUBE AND CUBE
description:
You can replay the game and complete the same level in different ways. 
Here, your goal is to pull the Red Cube out of the platform. 
The cube can move back and forth. 
Other clubs can move on different axes. 
Sometimes they can be an obstacle, and sometimes they can help you win. 
If you make a mistake, you can reload the level. 
And if the level is too difficult - then you can skip it and go to the next one. 
Controls: W, A, S, D.
